title: Behold Esports is looking for players to play in OCE Tourneys!

embed.description: Short application allowing us to get an idea on who you are, what you play and how much experience you have.

body:
Hello all!
I’m currently searching for players interested in playing in tourneys to earn RP and get better together with others. My aim is to get three teams started: 
High Gold team to play in I2G tourneys - 2-3 times a week
High Plat team to play in I2P tourneys - 2-3 times a week
Diamond+ team - 2-3 times a week

Majority of tourneys are held in the afternoons 6pm AEST. If you are interested just fill in the above form and I’ll be in touch. 

Thanks for your time!
